short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save 95% memory and reduce tab clutter with MainTab. Convert your open tabs into a list in Onetab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Is your browser getting bogged down by too many open tabs? With MainTab, you can instantly convert all your open tabs into an organized list, reducing memory usage by up to 95%! Perfect for multitaskers and professionals who work with multiple tabs, MainTab helps declutter your browser and free up your RAM.

Features:

 One-click tab management: Move all your open tabs into the MainTab list with a single click.
 Save memory: Reduce CPU load and browser memory usage by up to 95%.
 Organize tabs into groups: Easily create, name, and save groups of tabs for future use.
 Quick access to saved tabs: Reopen tabs or entire groups anytime with ease.
 Boost productivity: Stay focused by reducing tab clutter and improving browser performance.
Whether you have too many tabs open or simply want to optimize your browserâ€™s performance, MainTab offers a simple, effective solution.
